EmailTemplate.name: 06-17-21 DBNK Accelerate Magazine June Issue to Attended.Email 1A
EmailTemplate.subject: 7 can’t miss strategies to ACCELERATE always-on banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A new issue of our digital-first magazine, Accelerate, is now available! Inside this issue, you’ll find insights from NCR partners, customers and industry experts on the growing needs of the always-on consumer. Read issue 2 here. <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/accelerate-magazine-june]]> Learn about these topics and more: - The soaring demand for financial wellness solutions - How to make better use of your data - Research results highlighting banking habits by generation - See real-world financial wellness success, accelerated <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
